steps.title: Your Profile Hub
steps.description: This is your personal profile island. Click here to access your settings, edit your profile information, and manage your account preferences.

steps.title: Study Streak Tracker
steps.description: Keep motivated with your study streak! This tracks consecutive days of activity and helps you build consistent learning habits.

steps.title: Career Explorer
steps.description: Discover potential career paths and explore your interests. This island shows your saved career interests and helps you plan your future.

steps.title: Performance Analytics
steps.description: Visualize your learning progress with detailed analytics. Track study time, monitor performance trends, and gain insights into your learning patterns.

steps.title: Academic Progress Overview
steps.description: Monitor your overall academic progress with this comprehensive view. See completion rates, chapter progress, and performance metrics across all subjects.

steps.title: Calendar & Schedule
steps.description: Stay organized with your personal calendar. View upcoming events, manage your schedule, and never miss important deadlines or study sessions.

steps.title: Task Management
steps.description: Keep track of your assignments and to-do items. Add tasks quickly, mark them as complete, and stay on top of your responsibilities.

steps.title: Subject Mastery
steps.description: Track your progress across different subjects. See your mastery levels, identify areas for improvement, and celebrate your academic achievements.
